summary: WorldCat is an online catalog stystem which lists the combined collections of 70,000+ libraries in 170 countries.
full_text: WorldCat is a union catalog that itemizes the collections of 72,000 libraries in 170 countries and territories that participate in the Online Computer Library Center  global cooperative. It is operated by OCLC Online Computer Library Center, Inc.  The participating libraries collectively maintain WorldCat's database.
title: WorldCat
